mesmerist tricks.name: Astounding Avoidance
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject can avoid damage from magical and unusual attacks.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject attempts a saving throw against an attack or spell that normally deals half damage on a successful save.

mesmerist tricks.name: Compel Alacrity
mesmerist tricks.description: A dash of mental speed lets the subject push past her physical limits to avoid an enemy.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject begins her turn within an enemy’s reach.

mesmerist tricks.name: Chain of Eyes
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject can share her senses with the mesmerist.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: By closing his eyes and concentrating on the implanted subject.

mesmerist tricks.name: False Flanker
mesmerist tricks.description: A duplicate of the mesmerist appears momentarily, as though he were fighting in tandem with the subject.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject moves into or begins her turn in a square where she threatens an enemy.

mesmerist tricks.name: Fearsome Guise
mesmerist tricks.description: A veil of illusion makes the subject appear to be someone else and then transform into a hideous monster at an opportune time.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject attacks a creature.

mesmerist tricks.name: Fleet in Shadows
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject can move double its normal speed in dim or darker light.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: Whenever the target enters an area with dim or darker light.

mesmerist tricks.name: Gift of Will
mesmerist tricks.description: A small portion of the mesmerist’s vast mental power buttresses his ally’s mind.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject attempts a Will saving throw, Sense Motive check, or is targeted by an Intimidate check.

mesmerist tricks.name: Levitation Buffer
mesmerist tricks.description: A mesmerist’s telekinetic assault renders foes around the subject less of a threat.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When an enemy moves adjacent to the subject or the subject begins her turn with enemies adjacent to her.

mesmerist tricks.name: Linked Reaction
mesmerist tricks.description: A hive mind allows the mesmerist and an ally to share one another’s reaction times.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When either the subject or the mesmerist is surprised and the other isn’t.

mesmerist tricks.name: Mask Misery
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject can shrug off a condition for a short time before succumbing to it.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject becomes affected by a minor condition listed under the touch treatment ability.

mesmerist tricks.name: Meek Facade
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject magically seems like a weak target, goading an enemy into attacking her.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject misses a creature with an attack.

mesmerist tricks.name: Mesmeric Mirror
mesmerist tricks.description: An illusory image appears near the subject to throw off attackers.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject is attacked or becomes the target of a spell that requires an attack roll.

mesmerist tricks.name: Mesmeric Pantomime
mesmerist tricks.description: By orchestrating the movement of his ally’s body, the mesmerist imparts to that ally his own skill at a physical task.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject attempts a Strength– or Dexterity-based skill check.

mesmerist tricks.name: Misdirection
mesmerist tricks.description: An enemy’s perception of an attack by the subject shifts, making the foe unprepared to defend against the attack.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject makes an attack or uses a spell that requires an attack roll.

mesmerist tricks.name: Psychic Impression
mesmerist tricks.description: Objects retain psychic impressions of those who come in contact with them, and a powerful mind can read these impressions.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject touches an object that another creature with an Intelligence score of 3 or more has touched in the last 10 minutes.

mesmerist tricks.name: Psychosomatic Surge
mesmerist tricks.description: Psychic magic soothes the subject, alleviating her wounds temporarily.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject takes damage.

mesmerist tricks.name: Reflect Fear
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject suppresses the fear effect that triggered the trick for 1d4 rounds.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject is affected by a fear effect or is the target of an Intimidate check.

mesmerist tricks.name: Reflection of Weakness
mesmerist tricks.description: Psychic feedback causes an enemy to suffer from the same weakening effect it imposes on the subject.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When an attack or spell used by an enemy causes the subject to take ability damage, ability drain, bleed damage, or a minor or moderate condition.

mesmerist tricks.name: See in Darkness
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject gains darkvision with a range of 60 feet for 1 minute.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject moves into an area of darkness.

mesmerist tricks.name: Shadow Splinter
mesmerist tricks.description: The mesmerist protects the subject against an attack and redirects the harm to someone else.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject is targeted by an attack or by a spell that requires an attack roll.

mesmerist tricks.name: Slip Bonds
mesmerist tricks.description: While implanted with this trick, the subject gains a +2 circumstance bonus on Escape Artist checks.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: If the subject becomes grappled, pinned, shackled, or otherwise personally restrained.

mesmerist tricks.name: Spectral Smoke
mesmerist tricks.description: A cloud of smoke pops up around the subject, foiling attacks.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject is targeted by an attack or by a spell that requires an attack roll.

mesmerist tricks.name: Telepathic Link
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject can communicate telepathically with the mesmerist during a crisis.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject and her allies are outnumbered in combat.

mesmerist tricks.name: Umbral Shield
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject ignores any harmful effects of bright light or sunlight for 1 minute.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: Whenever the subject would be exposed to harmful bright light.

mesmerist tricks.name: Unwitting Messenger
mesmerist tricks.description: The mesmerist describes a recipient to the subject while implanting this trick, then recites a verbal message no longer than five words per mesmerist level.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject encounters the specified recipient.

mesmerist tricks.name: Vanish Arrow
mesmerist tricks.description: The mesmerist snatches a projectile from an enemy before it can be shot.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject is targeted by a ranged weapon attack, before the attack roll is made.

mesmerist tricks.name: Voice of Reason
mesmerist tricks.description: The subject can more easily pierce sight-based illusions with the mesmerist’s aid.
mesmerist tricks.trigger: When the subject attempts a saving throw to disbelieve a sight-based illusion effect.
